content.div:
Zac Efron: actor, singer, dancer...safe sex advocate? The 24-year-old has unwittingly found himself taking on a new role after video of him accidentally dropping a condom on a red carpet swept the web last week.

The hunky heartthrob admitted to the Today Show's Matt Lauer that a domer really did fall out of his pocket at the premiere of his new family-friendly movie, Dr. Seuss’ The Lorax. Lauer asked, “You want to take me through what happened?” to which Efron replied, "Um, I don't want to take you through it."

"You dropped a...a condom on the floor," Lauer stammered.

"Yeah," Efron sheepishly admitted. "Which was really hard for you to say."

"I never really had a pocket-checking policy prior to going on the red carpet before, but now we fully instated one,” he added.

"Better to be safe than sorry, right?" Lauer prompted.

"It’s a great message," the embarrassed actor agreed. "To add to the many messages in the film."

"It's nice at 24 you can still blush a little," Lauer teased.

"I can't help it right now," Efron said (making our hearts flutter).

Efron went onto talk about his new production company and his upcoming film, The Lucky One (which we can only assume was named after the intended recipient of Efron’s condom.)

Watch Efron’s Today Show interview below:

Visit msnbc.com for breaking news, world news, and news about the economy

link.title: Taylor Swift

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift and The Civil Wars debuted their Hunger Games music video "Safe & Sound." Check it out here, along with the movie soundtrack's full tracklisting, which features contributions from Arcade Fire and The Decemberists.
link.title: Taylor Swift, World's Least Likely Hunger Games Winner, Debuts Video

link.Abstract: How can you dump someone if nobody knows you're dating? Only Taylor Swift and Eddie Redmayne know the answer.
link.title: Taylor Swift Reportedly Dumped By Dude She Probably Wasn't Dating

link.Abstract: Watch Taylor Swift's new video for "Ours," wherein everyone's favourite country-pop star plays an office drone. The work world, much like any Swift video, is a lot like high school.
link.title: Zach Gilford, Cat Videos Help Taylor Swift Make it Through the Work Day; She's Just Like Us!

link.Abstract: Hot Chelle Rae's Ryan Follese and Nash Overstreet don't mind doing it for the kids. The "Tonight Tonight" hitmakers dish on why having a super-loyal fanbase is so not, like, Whatever.
link.title: Interview: Hot Chelle Rae

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift plays Stevie Nicks dress-up for the February issue of Vogue. Check out photos of the country-pop star shot by Mario Testino.
link.title: Photos: Taylor Swift Turns Vogue Cover Girl

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift's Speak Now World Tour is at its end. The country-pop star gave the first of two sold-out shows at New York's Madison Square Garden Nov. 21. We've got photos.
link.title: Photos: Taylor Swift at Madison Square Garden

link.Abstract: Adele will play the BRIT Awards on Feb. 21, buoying hopes that the "Someone Like You" singer might also perform at the Grammy Awards Feb. 12.
link.title: Adele Making Comeback at BRIT Awards; Will She Be Well Enough for a Grammy Gig, Too?
